None.Name: Blessed Teleport
None.Description: Creates a warp zone that teleports any unit within it to the target destination which has to be within 60m range of the zone. Any unit sent through the warp zone may only move at walk speed for 10 seconds. Lasts for 10 seconds. Reusable every 20 seconds.
